trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_SEQ_00<tab>Maru is vexed by monkey business.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_TODO_01<tab>Throw yellow gulal at hanuman langurs while riding the hippo cart.

TEXT_BANARK114_04564_MARU_000_001<tab>Havin' fresh food around the place is truly a blessin', but our kitchen's caught the attention of some hanuman langurs─an' the boss wants it sorted <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_MARU_000_002<tab>I reckon if we've been reelin' 'em in with the scent of our Hippo Rider Specials, we can use a different sort of smell to drive 'em out...
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_MARU_000_003<tab>Namely, gulal! It ain't toxic, but certain jungle critters can't stand its, er, unique aroma.

TEXT_BANARK114_04564_MARU_000_004<tab>Talk to Vata an' he'll tell you what sort of gulal makes a hanuman langur gag. Oh, an' take a cart while you're at it─we want those langurs to know that our hippos mean business. <var 1A 02 /var>Stenchy<var 1A 01 /var> business.
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_VATA_000_010<tab>How's it rollin'? Out to fling pigment at langurs, are we?

TEXT_BANARK114_04564_VATA_100_010<tab>Through proper research and suchlike, I've learned that yellow gulal is most effective for drivin' away hanuman langurs. Or maybe I accidentally hit one when I was throwin' a blessin' for plenty one day, an' haven't stopped laughin' since. Who's to say?
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_VATA_000_011<tab>Just don't forget─you've got a live hippo yoked to your cart, eh? In the immortal words of my mum, “Those who don't hold on, fall off.” Ta-ta!
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_VATA_000_012<tab>The secret to throwin' the perfect arc of gulal? Don't throw yourself with it.
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>According to Vata, yellow gulal is best for driving away hanuman langurs. Summon the color wheel to your mind's eye and try again!
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Speak with Vata in Svarna to mount the hippo cart, then throw yellow gulal at hanuman langurs.
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_MARU_000_030<tab>You're yellow up to your elbows! I'll bet the langurs can smell you from malms away.
TEXT_BANARK114_04564_MARU_000_031<tab>Still, somethin' tells me we haven't seen the last of 'em, so I might borrow your throwin' arm again before long...
